summary: Turkey in the 1960s and 70s was one of the biggest producers of film in the world even though its film industry did not have enough written material to start with. In order to keep up with ... See full summary »
cast: Ezel Akay|Aydemir Akbas|Cüneyt Arkin|Savas Arslan|Yilmaz Atadeniz|Sabri Demirdögen|Metin Demirhan|Sirri Elitas|Metin Erksan|Selahattin Geçgel|Mehmet Güler|Melih Gülgen|Izzet Günay|Seref Gür|Temel Gürsu|Hakan Gürtop|Fikret Hakan|Çetin Inanç|Birsen Kaya|Serhat Koksel|Esref Kolçak|Canan Perver|Duygu Sagiroglu|Giovanni Scognamillo|Rekin Teksoy|Kunt Tulgar|Kayhan Yildizoglu|Hüseyin Zan|Memduh Ün
title: Remake, Remix, Rip-Off: About Copy Culture & Turkish Pop Cinema
